DOC.brief_title: Bendamustine Hydrochloride Injection Initial Treatment Chronic Lymphocytic Leukemia
DOC.detailed_description: Patients assess response three cycle treatment . Two additional cycle recommend CR , PR SD patient , maximum limit six cycle total . Patients follow every three month disease progression death .
DOC.criteria: Patients must diagnosis CLL accord National Cancer Institute ( NCI ) Working Group criteria No prior treatment CLL Binet stage B C ECOG performance status ≤ 2 Life expectancy ≥3 month AST ALT ≤ 3 x ULN ; Total bilirubin ≤ 2 x ULN ; Creatinine clearance ≥ 40 mL/min Written inform consent Patients diagnose treated malignant tumor CLL ( include central nervous system lymphoma ) within one year prior enter study Transformation Richter 's syndrome , prolymphocytic leukemia ( PLL ) Autoimmune hemolytic anemia require glucocorticoid therapy Autoimmune thrombocytopenia require glucocorticoid therapy Participation clinical trial within 4 week prior study entry Any following condition : severe heart failure ; cardiomyopathy ; myocardial infarction within 6 month ; severe , uncontrolled diabetes ; severe , uncontrolled hypertension ; active , uncontrolled infection ; central nervous system dysfunction Patients receive major surgery within 30 day prior study entry Pregnant lactate woman Allergic study drug mannitol
